mainText:
Dear Apple and the relatives of Steve Jobs,
I am so sorry to hear of the loss of one of the greatest cultural heroes 
we know of from the 20th century into the 21st century.   No one I feel 
could ever replace him.  His vision of the future
never failed.   His ability to bring back Apple from the brink was 
nothing less than miraculous. I hope his spirit will live on in all that 
you do, and give us a moment to reflect what
technology would have been like had he not come back to Apple.    My 
condolences to everyone there.    And remember, he fought for the best 
quality product out there.  Don't ever forget that.
author: Abraham
